channel.title: Comments on: Guy Kawasaki on Business

item.title: By: Debi K

item.description: Thanks for the mention and review. We are very appreciative. If you have any suggestions and/or feedback please drop us a line at our newly revamped website! Thanks, debik at gliffy dot com

Thanks for the mention and review. We are very appreciative. If you have any suggestions and/or feedback please drop us a line at our newly revamped website! Thanks,
